archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Administratief ondersteunen van onderzoeken
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: <languages xml:space="preserve"><nl-NL>Onderzoeksprojecten vereisen administratieve ondersteuning zoals budgettering, planning, personeel, communicatie, verwerving van middelen, indiening van werkproducten, enz.</nl-NL><en-US>Research projects require such administrative support as budgeting, planning, staffing, communications, resource acquisition, submission of work products, etc.</en-US></languages>

properties.value: Onderzoeksprojecten vereisen administratieve ondersteuning zoals budgettering, planning, personeel, communicatie, verwerving van middelen, indiening van werkproducten, enz.
Research projects require such administrative support as budgeting, planning, staffing, communications, resource acquisition, submission of work products, etc.
